verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There is sunshine in my soul today, More glorious and bright Than glows in any earthly sky, For Jesus is my light.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There is springtime in my soul today, For when the Lord is near The dove of peace sings in my heart, The flowers of grace appear.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There is gladness in my soul today, And hope, and praise, and love, For blessings which He gives me now, For joys laid up above.{/lang-eng}
